group_1.textCenter: My "Super Mighty, Ultimate Treasure,@Best of the Best, Grape Popsicle".

group_1.textRight: Heya, Tsuruno! [chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]What's up?

group_1.textLeft: Felicia! Have you seen my grape popsicle@anywhere?
It's a "Super Mighty, Ultimate Treasure,@Best of the Best, Grape Popsicle".
I tucked it in the freezer for later, but@now I can't find it anywhere.

group_1.textRight: A grape popsicle? Oh, that...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You know where it is?!

group_1.textRight: I ate it like two days ago.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, okay. Was it good?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It was AMAZING!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Wait, hang on!
That was my popsicle! How could you?! I@was so excited to eat it!

group_1.textRight: Meh, not my problem.
If it mattered that much, ya should've@written your name on it.

group_1.textLeft: I DID write my name on it! I wrote@"Tsuruno", clear as day!

group_1.textRight: What?! [chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100501:motion_200][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]I didn't see any "Tsuruno" on it,@not anywhere!

group_1.textLeft: ...Wait a sec.
Can you read this?

group_1.textRight: Huh? What the hell's this say?

group_1.textLeft: It's "Tsuruno"! I just wrote it in cursive!

group_1.textRight: Why'd ya think I'd be able to read that@chicken scratch?!

group_1.textLeft: I'd think you could recognize the 'T' in@Tsuruno!

group_1.textRight: It just looks like a bunch of scribbles!@We haven't learned how to write like that!

group_1.textCenter: Hey now, what's all this shouting about?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'll tell you...
Felicia stole my popsicle and ate it!
Even though I wrote my name on it!

group_1.textRight: Made some scratches, more like!
Ah, I see.

group_1.textLeft: You tell her too, Yachiyo! Tell her not to@grab other people's food and eat it!

group_1.textRight: Well...

group_1.textLeft: Wait. Did you know about this?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. I saw her eating it two days ago.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]But [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][chara:100301:cheek_2][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]you didn't say anything when I saw@you yesterday!
You kept quiet even though you knew?!

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry I didn't say anything.
I simply thought it'd be better if you@didn't know.
I was going to buy another one and put it@in the freezer before you noticed.
Ignorance is bliss, or so they say.
If you hadn't found out, you wouldn't be@angry.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Hey! Just 'cause you were gonna buy a new@one doesn't mean it's okay not to tell me!
[chara:100301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]That doesn't make me feel any better!

group_1.textRight: Um, Tsuruno? It was my fault...
I promise I won't eat anything with that@weird writing on it from here on out.

group_1.textLeft: Be quiet, Felicia! I'm angry with Yachiyo@right now!

group_1.textRight: Hey, wait![chara:100501:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:100501:cheek_2][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1] I'm the one who ate your@popsicle.
No, you're right. I was wrong to try and@hide it from you.

group_1.textCenter: (Neither of them are listenin' to me...)

group_1.narration: "Be quiet, Felicia! I'm talking with your@mother right now!"
"Oh, are you now?! You're just going@to blame me like you always do!"
Dad and Mom used to@fight a lot 'cause of me too.
I never even wanted 'em to fight...

group_1.textLeft: This isn't the first time this happened!
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]This is your house, so you should keep@things in order!

group_1.textRight: I can't look out for every little thing...
You can't expect me to watch the refrigerator@all day.
Hey! Felicia?! [chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100201:cheek_1][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]What was that for?!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, you just made a mess of the whole@kitchen!

group_1.textCenter: I said it was MY fault!

group_1.textRight: Felicia, wait!
*Sigh* I worry about her.

group_1.textLeft: I'll help you clean this up.

group_1.textRight: Thank you.
I'm sorry about that just now...

group_1.textLeft: No, I was out of line too. Sorry.

group_1.textCenter: I wasn't plannin' on turning the whole@kitchen upside down.
